title: Torin
description: Evil comes in many forms, and right now it’s a beautiful, raven-haired woman hanging upside down on a stripper pole. Here in Vegas, they call her Destiny, but I know exactly who she really is. Lexi Cruz and her father ruined my life. They blackmailed me for millions. And then, when I refused to pay them another dime, they murdered my old lady and our unborn son. The only thing that has kept me going for the last few months is vengeance. I live and breathe for the day I’ll finally get my revenge. Guilt eats away at me a little more with each day that passes until there’s nothing left of the man I used to be. I’m ready for my dance with Destiny; to finally put an end to the suffering. But there are two sides to every story. And it turns out that Destiny may have a few secrets up her sleeve, secrets that will actually give me something worth living for again. This is third book in the Savage Kings MC series and the reading order Chase Abe Torin
author: Lane Hart
